```r
# Create variable for deltas and first and second lag of the delta
dist_deltas <- dists %>% 
  group_by(State, District) %>% 
  mutate(delta_letters = std12_letters_and_up - lag(std12_letters_and_up), delta_nums = std12_numbers_and_up - lag(std12_numbers_and_up)) %>%
  mutate(delta_letters_lagged = lag(delta_letters), delta_letters_dbl_lag = lag(delta_letters, 2)) %>%
  arrange(State, District, year)


# Calculate average autocorrelation of delta_letters
dist_deltas %>% 
  filter(year >= 2008) %>% 
  summarise(auto = cor(delta_letters, delta_letters_lagged, use = \pairwise.complete.obs\")) %>%
